Testing Instructions:
   * In ModelSim, change directory to the trunk of the repository (most likely a directory named either hmc-6502 or trunk).
   * In the ModelSim command prompt, type:
      * do {./TEST_LOCATION/TEST_NAME.fdo}
      * run -all
